pageProduct.name: Avene Cicalfate Hand Cream 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Repairing barrier cream for very dry and irritated hands.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Can be applied on open, broken skin. For external use only.

Common Uses

Repairing and protecting cream for very dry, irritated hands from external aggressions. Forms an insulating barrier on the skin. Micronized sucralfate facilitates the reparation of the epidermis and the combination of copper sulfate and zinc sulfate reduces the risk of bacterial contamination.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). MINERAL OIL (PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM). MYRETH-3 MYRISTATE. PEG-45/DODECYL GLYCOL COPOLYMER. DIMETHICONE. ALUMINUM SUCROSE OCTASULFATE. OCTYLDODECANOL. PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE. ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE. GLYCERIN. BEESWAX (CERA ALBA). CETYL ALCOHOL. COPPER SULFATE. DIMETHICONOL. DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE. GLYCERYL STEARATE. MAGNESIUM SULFATE. PHENOXYETHANOL. SODIUM BENZOATE. WATER (AQUA). XANTHAN GUM. ZINC SULFATE.

Directions

Apply at least twice a day,focusing on the the most irritated areas.
